title: Mr.Time : Signal
developerAddress: 2F, J Studio, 28, Donggyo-ro 25-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul, Republic of Korea, 03993
description: *This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps. This watch is called 'Signal'.[Mr.Time Watchface Series]We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.More different designs will be updated constantly.
descriptionHTML:
*This watch face is only available for Android Wear. Tizen OS(Gear S2, S3) Users can download from Galaxy apps.

This watch is called 'Signal'.


[Mr.Time Watchface Series]
We provide various analog&digital watches with features and sub-dials.
More different designs will be updated constantly.
comments: Add Customisation Please Great face, really alternative but please add customisation for date order. I live in the UK and don't use that format.
Free for aw, why not for tizen :(?
